questionTitle: I need to stop for a coffee. Is ____ all right with you?
Do you like _____ trousers? I bought them yesterday.
Look at ____ man over there! He's not wearing any clothes!
Her new house cost over half a million pounds. ______ a lot of money.
Hello. _______ Patrick. Can I speak to Murray, please?
_____ boots she is wearing look very expensive.
My grandmother never wore trousers when she was young. In _____ days it wasn't acceptable.
I'm going to London again ____ weekend . Do you want to come?
Yes, let's go to the restaurant tonight. _______ a great idea.
What's the name of ____ song by Robbie Williams we heard yesterday?
